Package frogger.control

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.control.GameController
  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    scyyx1 Represents the controller for the main game world. Contains some keyboard events during player interacting with the system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Frogger frogger
      An frogger object which is needed to act in game.
      private int keyBoardPress
      The parameter used to record how many times user press the keyboard.
      private GameModel model
      A game model

    • Constructor Summary

      A constructor to initialize set up the frogger and the game model.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController​(GameModel model)
        A constructor to initialize set up the frogger and the game model.
        Parameters:
        model - The game model which stores key data of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus​(long now)
        Update the status in model.
        Parameters:
        now - the current time.

      • checkKeyBoardPress

        public void checkKeyBoardPress​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Handle the event when keyboard is pressed. If certain event happen, the model will change its internal state according to the event action. if frog is moved, use event to get key code and update the frogger status and the key press count.
        Parameters:
        event - This event should be the one connected with the game world to get the react from the player.

      • checkKeyBoardRelease

        public void checkKeyBoardRelease​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Handle the event when keyboard is released. If certain event happened, the model will change its internal status according to the event action. if frog is moved, use event to get key code and update the status and initialize the key press count to zero.
        Parameters:
        event - This event should be the one connected with Frogger to make sure frogger can update its move and status.

      • updateFroggerDataWhenRelease

        public void updateFroggerDataWhenRelease()
        Method is used then keyboard is released. Update the points and the y position of last score line record. Set the change score to true.

      • pressValid

        public boolean pressValid()
        Check whether current frogger's y position is less than the last score line record
        Returns:
        true if the frogger's y is less than the last score line record.
